content: 33 row 16 chain 1 half_double_crochet around join with slip_stitch 33 row 17 single_crochet around in 3rd loop fasten_off weave in end 33 right glove copy left glove except - ​ ​ row 6 chain 1 half_double_crochet 26 times 2 half_double_crochet in 27th st *place stitch marker between 2 half_double_crochet * half_double_crochet in each stitch around join with slip_stitch 33 row 7 chain 1 half_double_crochet 27 times 2 half_double_crochet at stitch marker from previous row half_double_crochet in each stitch around join with slip_stitch 34 after row 11 - *place stitch marker in 1st half_double_crochet and 27th half_double_crochet from beginning of row * row 12 chain 1 half_double_crochet in 3rd loop to first stitch marker chain 6 and join with slip_stitch 33 pattern and photos ©2020 sarah heaney - lillith creations
